title: Paralegal
jobDescription: We are seeking a highly motivated and organized Paralegal to join our legal team.
jobResponsibility:
- Conduct legal research and gather evidence
- Draft legal documents and contracts
- Communicate with clients and opposing counsel
- Manage case files and ensure deadlines are met
educationalRequirements: Associate's degree in Paralegal Studies or related field
experiences: 2+ years of experience as a Paralegal
